endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: notes

param_schema.title: Notes
param_schema.description: Notes in tinynotation, with each bar separated by '|'. Use '?' for bars you want in-painted.

parameters.description: Notes in tinynotation, with each bar separated by '|'. Use '?' for bars you want in-painted.

parameters.name: chords

param_schema.title: Chords
param_schema.description: Chords (one chord per bar), with each bar separated by '|'. Use '?' for bars you want in-painted.

parameters.description: Chords (one chord per bar), with each bar separated by '|'. Use '?' for bars you want in-painted.

parameters.name: sample_width

param_schema.title: Sample Width
param_schema.description: Number of potential predictions to sample from. The higher, the more chaotic the output.

parameters.description: Number of potential predictions to sample from. The higher, the more chaotic the output.
